definition: to recount/to tell of/to relate/(fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: He told his troubles to every Tom, Dick and Harry.
sentences.chinese: 他見人就訴說自己的煩惱，不論張三，抑或李四。

sentences.english: She told him of his old mother's deceit.
sentences.chinese: 她向他訴說了母后的欺騙行爲。

sentences.english: They speak to the deeper history of painting.
sentences.chinese: 它們在向繪畫的歷史深處訴說。

sentences.english: He was determined to use music to tell the hard life of toiling masses.
sentences.chinese: 他決心用音樂來訴說勞苦大衆的生活的艱辛。

sentences.english: She sobbed out her unhappy lot.
sentences.chinese: 她嗚咽地訴說她的不幸遭遇。

sentences.english: He's always bleating about his problems.
Swilla explained what misfortune had forced her to come to Mos Eisley.
sentences.chinese: 斯薇拉訴說了那場將她趕到莫斯埃斯利的災禍。

sentences.english: She raved out her bitter fate.
sentences.chinese: 她語無倫次地訴說她悲慘的命運。

sentences.english: A paragraph describing the sorrows and joys love and hate.
sentences.chinese: 一段文字，訴說着悲喜愛恨。

sentences.english: A butterfly in the wind, and that the volume petals Shu , tell, my love.
sentences.chinese: 一如風中的蝴蝶，那花瓣的卷舒，訴說着，我的纏綿。

sentences.english: She's always going on about her various problems.
sentences.chinese: 她總是沒完沒了地訴說她的各種問題。

sentences.english: The woman complained to the police that the man had been touching her up on the bus.
sentences.chinese: 那個婦女向警察訴說那人在汽車上偷偷摸她。

sentences.english: In comparison women like to tell and share.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，女性喜歡訴說和分享。

sentences.english: I also felt the need to speak out about the detrimental effect I felt my step-parents had had on my life.
sentences.chinese: 我還感到需要訴說自己一生中對繼父母所造成的傷害。

definition: to recount/to narrate/to give an account of
to talk about/to narrate/to give an account
to say everything (that is on one's mind)
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
bit by bit/dribs and drabs/the little details/every aspect
to look for/to seek/to find fault
